title: geoadd
blurb: Local-first geo addressing: normalize, geocode/reverse-geocode, and export geohash/H3/Open Location Code.
description: geoadd is a privacy-respecting geo addressing toolkit. It cleans and canonicalizes postal addresses, geocodes them using configurable providers (including offline OSM-based indexes), and emits compact spatial encodings (geohash, H3, Open Location Code). Batch CLI and REST server modes support large datasets with streaming I/O, deterministic hashing of PII, and signed, reproducible manifests.
